wikipedia_page.main: Kevin McMahon (born 1 March 1946) is an English former footballer who played as a forward in the Football League for York City, Bolton Wanderers, Barnsley and Hartlepool United.

response: *Kevin McMahon (athlete) (born 1972), American retired track and field athlete
